checkAABBCollision(MovingEntity, Object, Time) - Static method in class com.rubynaxela.kyanite.physics.Collisions
Checks if a moving axis-aligned rectangular object would collide with other axis-aligned rectangular object (which is assumed to be stationary) in the next scene frame provided its velocity would not change in the current scene frame.
